description.value: More future memories of time magic percolate back to the present, teaching you spells you've yet to learn. Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Behold the Weave], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Cast into Time], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Haste], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Loose Time's Arrow], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Quicken Time], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Slow], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Stagnate Time] to your spell list. You can thus potentially learn these spells even if they aren't normally on your tradition's spell list.
